extension.name: HG VirtueMart Products Carousel
extension.author: The VirtueMart Development Team
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2004-2012 Virtuemart Team. All rights reserved.
extension.description: Displays products such as Best sales, Featured products, Last products, Random products

field.name: product_group
field.label: Display
field.description: Select the type of product you would like to display

field.name: max_items
field.label: Number of displayed products
field.description: Choose the number of products that will be displayed in the module.

field.name: show_price
field.label: Show Product Price?
field.description: Defines wether the product price is displayed or not.

field.name: show_addtocart
field.label: Show Add-To-Cart Link?
field.description: Defines wether the Add-To-Cart Link is displayed or not.

field.name: filter_category
field.label: Use category filter
field.description: Show only the product from this category?

field.name: virtuemart_category_id
field.label: Category
field.description: Select the category to choose the products from.

field.name: customitemid
field.label: Custom Item ID ?
field.description: Add a custom Item ID. The problem is that the product page that the products within the carousel will link to, will inherit the modules. To prevent that, either add an Item ID.

field.name: class_sfx
field.label: Menu Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items
